publicationstmt.publisher: University of Pennsylvania, Rare Book and Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.repository: University of Pennsylvania, Rare Book and Manuscript Library

bioghist.p: David B. Walker attended Harding Junior High, Frankford High School, and Northeast High Summer School in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. He was enrolled in a Junior Business Training course and other courses. He may have lived at 4535 Mulberry Street in Philadelphia (address on practice telegrams).

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of junior high school and high school notebooks of David B. Walker. Many of the notebooks are for courses in business and bookkeeping. Other topics include history, English, geography, science, and hygiene. Some have ephemera and clippings related to the topics pasted in. The collection also includes printed assignments and practice forms for bookkeeping courses.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
